        Create a point in 3D space.

    • Method Detail

      • fromCylindrical

        public static Point fromCylindrical(double r,
                                    double theta,
                                    double z)
        Create a point from the cylindrical coordinate system.
        Parameters:
        r - The magnitude of the X-Y component.
        theta - The angle around the Z axis in radians.
        z - The z value.
        Returns:
        The cartesian representation of the point in the cylindrical coordinate system.

        Add two points together.
        Parameters:
        transform - The point to add.
        Returns:

        Move a point by a scalar.
        Parameters:
        transform - The scalar to add to the point.
        Returns:
        The point moved along each of its axes by the scalar.

        Move a point by a vector.
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • subtract

        public Point subtract(Point transform)
        Subtract two points.
        Parameters:
        transform - The point to subtract.
        Returns:
        A point which is the difference of this point and the other point.

        public Point subtract(double transform)
        Move a point in the opposite direction by a scalar.
        Parameters:
        transform - The scalar to subtract from the point.
        Returns:
        The point moved along each of its axes by the scalar in the opposite direction.

        Returns:
